divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside of my house smoking a cigarette when I saw what looked to be an extraordinarily bright airplane flying at a relatively slow rate, about the pace you'd see a typical airplane flying if not a bit slower. Eventually, after roughly 5 minutes of my observation, it stopped dead. It was blinking steadily orange while it moved, but once it stopped the blinking became less frequent and the color seemed to change to its own star-like white, eventually blinking very sporadically. By far the brightest object in the sky. It remains stationary as I type.
Summary: I saw an extraordinarily bright airplane flying at a relatively slow rate, about the pace you'd see a typical airplane flying but a bit slower. Eventually it stopped dead
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Watervliet
There were no other sightings in Watervliet on or around October 24th 2011
